original_text: Beside their genealogy of males, from three years old and upward, even unto every one that entereth into the house of the Lord, his daily portion for their service in their charges according to their courses;
korean_text: 삼 세 이상으로 족보에 기록된 남자 외에 날마다 여호와의 전에 들어가서 그 반열대로 직무에 수종드는 자들에게 다 나눠 주며

sentences.original_text: from three years old and upward
even unto every one that entereth into the house of the Lord
his daily portion for their service
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 봉사를 위한 그의 일정한 몫

sentences.original_text: in their charges according to their courses
